name: Piano, Self-Portrait (Self-Portrait As Sine-Wave Study)
description:
Generative photograph. Raw (unedited) photo.

Setup: A single vertical projected line of light moves left<>right in a sine-wave against a wall. I try to match the motion & speed with my body. The movement occurs over 1 second and my camera is set to take a 1 second exposure. All three of us strive for perfect harmony, but total synchronicity is impossible.

The collision between frequencies acts a generator; patterned generative architectures and iterative identities emerge into existence.

Image created entirely in-camera, no fx

1728x2592px, Berlin 2011
